name: GMTKJam 2019 - Broken Steering
description:
Broken Steering

  • Controller Input only (Was used to learn the new Unity input system)
  • South face button to accelerate (A on XInput)
  • East face button to brake (B on XInput)
  • You can only steer left!

Have fun, and don't fall off the map!

All assets used courtesy of various KenneyNL asset packs!
